abstrac: iOS Android MacOS Windows Web development and QA
bio:
AdoriaSoft offers full cycle software development services and implements all stages of projects:

- research
- requirements definition
- architecting
- development
- graphical design
- QA
- support and updates

Platforms that we develop for:
- iOS (iPhones and iPads of different versions)
- Android phones and tablets
- MacOS
- Windows desktop
- Windows Server
- Windows CE
- Windows Mobile PPC and SP 5.0, 6.0, 6.5, 7 editions

We
- have different real devices for testing (Android phones and tablets, iPhones, iPads of different generations, Macbooks, etc), no emulators.
- work with both native and crossplatform frameworks
- use an established design/development/testing lifecycle, follow scrum
- have our own development servers with tasks management system (JIRA), source control (Git), continuous integration and build server (Bamboo), etc.
- can easy work with time zones like PST, EST, etc.
- offer high quality and cost effective solutions for our customers

description.title: Human Resources Consultant
description: I am looking to provide Human Resources Consulting and supportive services in HR development, Payroll processing, policy development, on-boarding, HR Strategy, performance improvement, data entry, and…

bio: I have 9 years of providing Human Resources Development services with companies globally in the UK, Australia, Africa, and the USA.  The following services provided include supervisory and management training facilitation and coaching, curriculum development, progressive discipline, terminations, recruitment, HR organizational  development, policy and procedure manual development, online ADP payroll, data entry, office organization and administration consulting for start-up small businesses to nonprofit organizations. I am seeking contract or freelance opportunities to provide Human Resources Consulting, Payroll and other HR development related capacity.

Hours:  My hours of operation are typically 9:00 am  to 3:00 pm Eastern Time Zone. However, I do offer non-traditional hours for some projects based on need and timelines.  

Communication: I am available for communication through Guru email, Skype, and gmail.  All other forms of communication must be discussed in advance.

Payment Terms: All payments will be accepted through Guru Safe Pay invoicing and payment system.  Set price projects, I require 50% upfront and the remaining balance due upon completion of project.

description: I write books, guides, reports and Power Point presentation related to Civil Engineering, Social Media, Digital Marketing, Finance and Business subjects. Since I have the necessary educational qualifi…

abstrac: Expert Writer - Civil Engineering / Social Media / Business Studies
bio:
As an accomplished writer with 7+ years of experience, I have written books on a plethora of subjects. With time, I channelised my writing skills to match my educational qualifications; it served two brilliant purposes: 

1. I could use my 'Subject Matter Expertise' for structuring and creating content 

2. I work on topics that I am passionate about. The end result - the client is happy and satisfied with my work! 

I am also a certified Instructional Designer and therefore am able to create content that is both engaging and entertaining. I mainly write books, guides and reports on the following subjects:

1. Civil Engineering - I hold a Bachelors Degree in Civil Engineering discipline

2. Social Media/Digital Marketing - Experience is the best teacher; I have written more than 25 books and guides on Social Media and Digital Marketing

3. Finance - I hold an MBA degree from London majoring in Corporate Finance and have written books on Money Laundering, Structured Products and Behavioral Financial Investments

Value Added Solutions (VAS):

Following are the VAS that you get upon hiring me:
1. TOC creation
2. Content development
3. Chapter headings and sub topic(s) development
4. Research & Writing
5. Copy Editing
6.End-of-Chapter questions
7. Multiple revisions

bio:
I have over 18 years of embedded hardware and firmware design. Experience with FPGAs, DSPs and microcontrollers. Also experienced with many different types of peripherals including FLASH, SRAM, LCDs, encoders, temperature sensors, ADCs, DACs and EEPROMS and many others.

I also have experience with analog and digital circuit design. I also have experienced in schematic capture, PCB routing and component derating.

Many years of experince with PSPICE, Matlab/Simulink/PLECS, Altium, Eagle, Expedition, LabView and MS VisualStudio.
